mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.place AS "place", a.student_id AS "studentId", a.name AS "name", a.sex AS "sex", a.age AS "age", a.grade AS "grade", a.teacher AS "teacher", a.score AS "score"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, place, student_id, name, sex, age, grade, teacher, score ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{place}, #{studentId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{grade}, #{teacher}, #{score} )
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, place = #{place}, student_id = #{studentId}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, grade = #{grade}, teacher = #{teacher}, score = #{score} WHERE id = #{id}
